title: Pygmies of the Ituri Forest
creator_credit: Jean-Pierre Hallet and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Records the many aspects of the life of the Efe Pygmies of Zaire, Africa. Pygmies cease to grow after eight - nine years but they also mature incredibly quickly and are ready for marriage at this age. Looks at thier ceremonies and rituals and at exploitation and destruction of their home forest.
